summary: DXY Fractal A3.8 backend testing completed successfully. All horizon-specific defaults, mode classification, and trading controls are working correctly with version DXY_V1.1.0.

resolved_issues.issue: Backend service configuration mismatch - supervisor was configured for Python/uvicorn but backend is Node.js/TypeScript
resolved_issues.resolution: Started proper Node.js TypeScript fractal server using start-fractal.sh script
resolved_issues.impact: Backend now fully operational on localhost:8001

infrastructure_notes.finding: Backend runs on Node.js/TypeScript, not Python as initially configured in supervisor
infrastructure_notes.current_state: Running correctly on localhost:8001 with proper DXY module loaded

passed_tests: Health Endpoint - Returns ok=true with FRACTAL_ONLY mode
DXY Fractal 30d Tactical - mode='tactical', tradingEnabled=true, windowLen=180, version=DXY_V1.1.0
DXY Fractal 90d Regime - mode='regime', tradingEnabled=false, windowLen=600, action='HOLD', warnings present
DXY Synthetic 30d - All A3.8 meta fields present (mode, tradingEnabled, configUsed, warnings)
DXY Synthetic 90d - Regime mode with non-empty warnings array

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All A3.8 DXY Fractal endpoints working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: Not tested - backend only testing requested

action_item_for_main_agent: A3.8 implementation is fully deployed and working correctly. Consider updating supervisor configuration to use proper Node.js startup script instead of Python wrapper for better service management. Backend is accessible on localhost:8001 with all DXY endpoints operational.
